Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes localities to adopt local laws, ordinances or resolutions imposing a tax on carryout bags
Summary: Authorizes localities to adopt local laws, ordinances or resolutions imposing a tax on carryout bags.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing localities to adopt local laws, ordinances or resolutions imposing a tax on carryout bags
